mapper.select: SELECT o.created_at, o.order_id, od.product_name, od.size, od.color, od.quantity, od.product_total_price, pdi.product_id, cd.code_name FROM orders o JOIN order_detail od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN product_detail pd ON od.product_detail_id = pd.product_detail_id JOIN product_description_image pdi ON pd.product_id = pdi.product_id JOIN code_detail cd ON o.order_status = cd.code_no WHERE o.customer_id = #{customer_id} AND o.active_flag = 1 ORDER BY o.order_id DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT o.created_at, o.order_id, o.total_amount, o.total_discount_amount, p.discount_amount, p.final_amount, p.bank_deposit, p.account_deposit, pm.name, s.basic_address, s.detail_address, s.receive_people, s.receive_phone_number, s.shipping_price, od.serial_number, od.product_name, od.size, od.color, od.quantity, od.product_total_price, pdi.product_id, cd.code_name FROM orders o JOIN payment p ON o.order_id = p.order_id JOIN payment_method pm ON p.payment_method_id = pm.payment_method_id JOIN shipping s ON o.order_id = s.order_id JOIN order_detail od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN product_detail pd ON od.product_detail_id = pd.product_detail_id JOIN product_description_image pdi ON pd.product_id = pdi.product_id JOIN code_detail cd ON o.order_status = cd.code_no WHERE o.order_id = #{order_id} AND o.active_flag = 1
